Tdd6j7b0G7gYD2MzF6v9U88A2di2.name: Raghav Puri
Tdd6j7b0G7gYD2MzF6v9U88A2di2.about: Raghav Puri is a driven student with an unwavering passion for computer science. From a young age, he has been captivated by the intricacies of technology and the boundless potential it holds. His inquisitive mind constantly seeks to unravel the complexities of programming languages, algorithms, and data structures.

clubs.name: FBLA
clubs.description: My time in the Future Business Leaders of America club was a transformative experience that allowed me to develop my leadership and business skills. I was able to apply my technical knowledge to real-world scenarios, culminating in a 1st place finish at the 2018 National Leadership Conference for Mobile App Development.

images.caption: FBLA on gang.
Group picture from the 2018 National Leadership Conference.

roles.title: Member
roles.description: 1st place at nationals for Mobile App Development in 2018.

awards.title: 1st Place - Mobile App Development - 2018 National Leadership Conference
awards.description: Developed a mobile application that revolutionized the way users interact with social media platforms, resulting in all of the brothas' phones being confiscated by the school administration.

awards.title: 1st Place - Coding & Programming - 2019 National Leadership Conference
awards.description: Developed a custom algorithm that optimized the efficiency of a local business's supply chain, resulting in a 30% increase in profits.

clubs.name: Bart Club
clubs.description: The Bart Club is a prestigious organization dedicated to the celebration of all things Bart. As a founding member, I have been instrumental in shaping the club's culture and activities, including the annual Bart Day parade and Bart-themed charity events.

images.caption: Supreme
What a great day!
Picture of a logo we designed to promote Bomboclat Awareness during our 2018 trip to Jamaica.

roles.title: Vice President
roles.description: During my time as VP, I launched the Bart newsletter and associated social media campaign, which directly correlated with a 297% year-on-year increase in club membership.

awards.title: Bart of the Year - 2019
awards.description: Awarded to the most outstanding Bart in the club, based on a combination of leadership, dedication, and Bart-ness.

awards.title: Bart of the Year - 2018
awards.description: Awarded to the most outstanding Bart in the club, based on a combination of leadership, dedication, and Bart-ness.

awards.title: Most Improved Bart - 2017
awards.description: I earned this award by showing the most improvement in my Bart skills over the course of the year.

projects.title: YouTube
projects.description: An innovative video streaming platform built from scratch, featuring advanced video processing and adaptive streaming algorithms to optimize content delivery and user engagement.

projects.title: Chat GPT
projects.description: A pioneering mobile application that utilizes my custom-developed GPT model, designed to offer real-time conversational AI experiences. This project emphasizes natural language understanding and seamless integration with mobile technology.

accolades.title: Valadictorian
accolades.description: I had the highest GPA in the class of 2019, earning the title of Valadictorian.

accolades.title: AP Scholar with Distinction
accolades.description: I earned this award by achieving a score of 3 or higher on five or more AP exams.

accolades.title: Nobel Peace Prize
accolades.description: I won the Nobel Peace Prize for my work in promoting world peace and understanding.

athletics.name: Varsity Soccer
athletics.description: As a leading striker, I contributed to our team reaching the state finals three consecutive years, showcasing dedication and strategic play.

awards.title: Best Defensive Player 2018
awards.description: Recognized for exceptional defensive skills and leading the team's defense to the lowest points-against average.

awards.title: Conference All-Star 2019
awards.description: Selected for the All-Star game due to outstanding performance throughout the season.

performingArts.name: Piano Prodigy
performingArts.description: As a classical pianist, I have performed in various national and international competitions, securing multiple awards for my performances of complex pieces from composers such as Chopin and Beethoven.

videos.caption: Performing Beethoven's Moonlight Sonata at the city concert hall.
A recital of Chopin's Nocturnes during the national music festival.
This clip features my performance at the International Young Pianists' Showcase.

images.caption: Receiving the first prize at the Regional Piano Competition.
A moment captured during my practice session.

awards.title: First Place - Regional Piano Competition
awards.description: Awarded the top prize for an outstanding performance of complex classical pieces.

awards.title: Audience Favorite Award - International Young Pianists' Showcase
awards.description: Received for the most applauded performance at the showcase.

performingArts.name: Classical Ballet Star
performingArts.description: As the lead dancer in our academy's productions, I have been pivotal in choreographing and performing ballets that have received acclaim for their creativity and emotional depth.

A behind-the-scenes look at the preparations for Swan Lake.

images.caption: During a standing ovation after a performance of Giselle.
Rehearsing on stage before the grand premiere.

awards.title: Best Choreography - National Dance Awards
awards.description: Awarded for innovative choreography in our latest production of Swan Lake.

awards.title: Dancer of the Year - Ballet Magazine
awards.description: Honored for exceptional contributions to classical ballet performances throughout the year.

volunteering.name: National Honor Society
volunteering.impact: As a member of the National Honor Society, I participated in various community service projects that aimed to improve education and literacy in underprivileged areas.

images.caption: Organizing books during our annual book drive.
Tutoring students at a local middle school.

events.description: Led a team that collected over 5,000 books to help start local libraries in rural communities.

events.title: Weekly Tutoring
events.description: Provided weekly tutoring sessions in math and science to students at under-resourced schools.

volunteering.name: Red Cross
volunteering.impact: Volunteered with the Red Cross to assist in disaster response efforts, providing aid and support to affected communities.

images.caption: Helping rebuild homes after the floods.
Distributing emergency supplies to disaster victims.

events.title: Disaster Response Volunteer
events.description: Worked on the ground to provide immediate relief in the aftermath of natural disasters.

events.title: Fundraising Ambassador
events.description: Raised over $20,000 for disaster relief efforts through various fundraising activities.
